content: Great app, even better customer service from the app designer. Couldn't be more happy with it. It's finally got my son interested in trying to write.
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

content: Wonderful app my 5 year old loves it!
replyContent: Thanks for your review :-)

content: Has begun crashing and volume does not consistently work. Using it on Samsung tablet
replyContent: Sorry for this - the new version 2.6.6 should fix your issue, please let us know.

content: Great for learning to write letters correctly

It's a great app my boys love it and it helps my son work on writing his 
name my only complain is this app double charged me and I wasn't able to 
add the game to my 3 year olds tablet.
replyContent: please send us an email (support@gmail.com) to refund you and to explain to you how to install the app of your child's tablet

content: Had issues, but got a very prompt response. I am very excited to buy future apps from this developer as my daughter progresses. This app is a must have for young learning minds. ‚ù§
replyContent: Please send an email to support@lescapadou.com with your google play account email and I will refund your purchase. For your information, there is a restore button in the free app to restore purchase (because sometimes it happens that the connection between the app and the google play billing servers fails during the purchase)

content: I've added the words of the week for our daughter. When she arrives home from school (transition) she wants to play with the app. It's fabulous.

Bought full version as soon as I tried free and realized I could add words and word lists. Now when her words for the week (-at family; cat, bat, rat) come home I make a new list and we can practice and review whenever we like. Now a mandatory part of nightly homework! It reinforces what she is learning anyway and because its fun she retains it better! 100 thank yous!
replyContent: Thank you!

content: I have used the app but it hesitates between letters. Once I updated it will not open and I have not been able to get a response from support.
replyContent: Hello, Sorry for the delay, please contact us at support@lescapadou.com we may have missed your message. Thank you.

content: Help! This is a 5 star on my iPad, but I just purchased the full app for my droid and it won't open ! My device doesn't need any updates, so what gives? Help if you can, please!
replyContent: Hello, sorry for this issue, just try to uninstall and reinstall the app.

content: My daughter loves this app and pretty educational too but it keeps closing! And this is the one I paid for?! Can something be done about that please?
replyContent: Hello, sorry for this issue, please contact us at support@lescapadou.com. We will try to fix it. Thanks.

content: This could be such a great app, but every single time we try to use it, it locks up.  Very disappointing, particularly since I purchased it!
replyContent:
Hello,
We are very sorry for this issue. Please contact us at support@lescapadou.com and we will help you to have it working. Thanks.

content: I love this app and use it regularly in my classroom, but recently, the app has been freezing whenever anyone tries to write anything. Very disappointing.
replyContent:
Hello,
We are very sorry for this issue. Please contact us at support@lescapadou.com and we will help you to have it working. Thanks.

content: Camryn Randle
Keeps crashing as soon as my daughter does a letter. Nexus 7 android 6.0.1
replyContent:
Hello, 
We are very sorry for this issue, can you please contact us to support@lescapadou.com so we try to fix this? Thanks by advance.

content: Every time  I  open it
replyContent:
Hello, 
We are very sorry for this issue. Does the 2.1.7 version fix it?

content: My phone is completely up to date and still won't even open the app with it crashing!
replyContent:
Hello, 
We are very sorry for this issue, can you please contact us to support@lescapadou.com so we try to fix this? Thanks by advance.

content: This app is well thought out and my daughter loves it, thank you
replyContent:
Thanks a lot!
We have an announce to do for some users here: on Galaxy S6, S6 edge, Note 5 and some other devices on Android 5, if you have some crash you need to update your Android version from 5 to 6 going into your device settings / about device / system update. Thanks.

content: My son can actually go at his own speed and not have to. Be upset if he can't trade the letters right
Freezes with just a blue screen often
replyContent: We've have released a brand new version - please check that it solves your issue.

content: Doesnt load, what a waste
replyContent: Update: please try to update your Android version (Settings / About device / System update). This issue concerns Galaxy S6 - S6 Edge - Note5

content: Good formation of shapes, letters and numbers. Can be tailored to the child's needs and is fun too. Sadly I've had to use the cursive one to match the child's school style.
The app continues to crash.
replyContent: A new version  (2.0) is available with a lot of new features and should fix your crash (sorry for that) - please report here or email support@lescapadou.com if the app continues to crash after the update. Thanks !

content: My daughter practise her bubble gum word with it for school. Very good program.
replyContent:
Edit: it's now fixed with the new version 1.5.1
Thanks for your bug report. It looks like it is specific to your kind of device. We are going to fix it quickly.

content: but last update - "icon update" - are you serious?
replyContent: Yes we are. We have made an icon change to better distinguish Writing Wizard app from Cursive Writing Wizard app.

content: My 3 year old loves it. Only way she will practise her letters!! Really easy to use.
A few shapes don't let you trace them all the way. The star in particular.
replyContent: You can change the difficulty to easier or use less animations (check in settings) - on some device it helps to have a better tuning.
